GSD37gautdh_u:4: GautAA_1,1.3 / GautSt_1.3: dṛṣṭo dharmavyatikramaḥ sāhasaṃ ca mahatāṃ /
GSD37gautdh_u:9: GautAA_1,1.7 / GautSt_1.6: navame pañcame vā kāmyam /
GSD37gautdh_u:12: GautAA_1,1.10 / GautSt_1.9: tad yasmāt sa ācāryaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:15: GautAA_1,1.13 / GautSt_1.12: ā ṣoḍaśād brāhmaṇasyāpatitā sāvitrī /
GSD37gautdh_u:39: GautAA_1,1.34 / GautSt_1.35: prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā śaucam ārabheta /
GSD37gautdh_u:40: GautAA_1,1.35 / GautSt_1.36: śucau deśe āsīno dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ jānvantarākṛtvā yajñopavītyā maṇibandhanāt pāṇī prakṣālya vāgyatohṛdayaspṛśas triś catur vāpa ācāmed /
GSD37gautdh_u:46: GautAA_1,1.40 / GautSt_1.37: suptvā bhuktvā kṣutvā ca punaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:47: GautAA_1,1.41 / GautSt_1.38: dantaśliṣṭeṣu dantavad anyatra jihvābhimarśanāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:49: GautAA_1,1.43 / GautSt_1.40: cyuteśu āsrāvavad vidyān nigirann eva tac śuciḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:50: GautAA_1,1.46 / GautSt_1.41: na mukhyā vipruṣa ucchiṣṭaṃ kurvanti na ced aṅgenipatanti /
GSD37gautdh_u:52: GautAA_1,1.46 / GautSt_1.43: tad adbhiḥ pūrvaṃ mṛdā ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:56: GautAA_1,1.49a / GautSt_1.46: pāṇinā savyam upasaṅgṛhya anaṅguṣṭham adhīhi bho ity āmantrayed guruṃ /
GSD37gautdh_u:64: GautAA_1,1.52 / GautSt_1.51: oṃ pūrvā vyāhṛtayaḥ pañca satyāntāḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:67: GautAA_1,1.55 / GautSt_1.54: anujñāta upaviśet prāṅmukho dakṣiṇataḥ śiṣya udaṅmukhovā /
GSD37gautdh_u:71: GautAA_1,1.59 / GautSt_1.58: antara gamane punar upasadanam /
GSD37gautdh_u:73: GautAA_1,1.60 / GautSt_1.59: śvanakulasarpamaṇḍūkamārjārāṇāṃ try aham upavāsovipravāsaś ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:79: GautAA_1,2.1 / GautSt_2.1a: prāg upanayanāt kāmacāraḥ kāmavādaḥ kāmabhakṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:88: GautAA_1,2.8 / GautSt_2.4: na tv evainam agnihavanabaliharaṇayor niyuñjyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:89: GautAA_1,2.9 / GautSt_2.5: na brahmābhivyāhārayed anyatra svadhāninayanāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:97: GautAA_1,2.17 / GautSt_2.11: tiṣṭhet pūrvām āsītottarāṃ sajyotiṣyā jyotiṣodarśanād vāgyataḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:105: GautAA_1,2.23 / GautSt_2.17: dyūtaṃ hīnasevām adattādānaṃ hiṃsām /
GSD37gautdh_u:112: GautAA_1,2.28 / GautSt_2.23: nāmagotre guroḥ samānato nirdiśet /
GSD37gautdh_u:129: GautAA_1,2.42 / GautSt_2.36: ādimadhyānteṣu bhavacchabdaḥ prayojyo varṇānukrameṇa /
GSD37gautdh_u:132: GautAA_1,2.44 / GautSt_2.38: teṣāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pariharet /
GSD37gautdh_u:142: GautAA_1,2.51 / GautSt_2.45: dvādaśa varṣāṇy ekavede brahmacaryaṃ caret /
GSD37gautdh_u:145: GautAA_1,2.54 / GautSt_2.48: vidyānte gurur arthena nimantryaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:153: GautAA_1,3.2 / GautSt_3.2: brahmacārī gṛhastho bhikṣur vaikhānasaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:154: GautAA_1,3.3 / GautSt_3.3: teṣāṃ gṛhastho yonir aprajanatvād itereṣām /
GSD37gautdh_u:160: GautAA_1,3.7b / GautSt_3.8: tadabhāve vṛddhe sabrahmacāriṇy agnau vā /
GSD37gautdh_u:161: GautAA_1,3.8 / GautSt_3.9: evaṃvṛtto brahmalokam āpnoti jitendriyaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:175: GautAA_1,3.19 / GautSt_3.20: nāviprayuktam oṣadhivanaspatīnām aṅgam upādadīta /
GSD37gautdh_u:176: GautAA_1,3.20 / GautSt_3.21: na dvitīyām apartu rātriṃ grāme vaset /
GSD37gautdh_u:181: GautAA_1,3.25 / GautSt_3.26: vaikhānaso vane mūlaphalāśī tapaḥśīlaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:190: GautAA_1,3.32 / GautSt_3.33: grāmaṃ ca na praviśet /
GSD37gautdh_u:194: GautAA_1,3.35 / GautSt_3.36: ekāśramyaṃ tv ācāryāḥ pratyakṣavidhānādgārhasthasya gārhasthasya /
GSD37gautdh_u:198: GautAA_1,4.1 / GautSt_4.1: gṛhasthaḥ sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ vindetānanyapūrvāṃyavīyasīm /
GSD37gautdh_u:204: GautAA_1,4.5 / GautSt_4.7: saṃyogamantraḥ prājāpatye saha dharmaś caryatām iti /
GSD37gautdh_u:205: GautAA_1,4.6 / GautSt_4.8: ārṣe gomithunaṃ kanyāvate dadyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:207: GautAA_1,4.8 / GautSt_4.10: icchantyāḥ svayaṃ saṃyogo gāndharvaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:220: GautAA_1,4.16 / GautSt_4.18: brāhmaṇy ajījanat putrān varṇebhya ānupūrvyādbrāhmaṇasūtamāgadhacaṇḍālān /
GSD37gautdh_u:233: GautAA_1,4.22 / GautSt_4.27: asamānāyāṃ tu śūdrāt patitavṛttiḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:240: GautAA_1,4.27 / GautSt_4.33: daśa pūrvān daśa parān ātmānaṃ cabrāhmīputro brāhmīputraḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:250: GautAA_1,5.6 / GautSt_5.7: bhāryādir agnir dāyādir vā /
GSD37gautdh_u:253: GautAA_1,5.8 / GautSt_5.9: devapitṛmanuṣyayajñāḥ svādhyāyaś ca balikarma /
GSD37gautdh_u:254: GautAA_1,5.9 / GautSt_5.10: agnāv agnir dhanvantarir viśve devāḥ prajāpatiḥsviṣṭakṛd iti homaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:270: GautAA_1,5.21 / GautSt_5.23: pratiśrutyāpy adharmasaṃyuktāya na dadyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:274: GautAA_1,5.24 / GautSt_5.26: ācāryapitṛsakhīnāṃ ca nivedya pacanakriyā /
GSD37gautdh_u:280: GautAA_1,5.30 / GautSt_5.32: śrotriyasya tu pādyam arghyam annaviśeṣāṃś caprakārayet /
GSD37gautdh_u:296: GautAA_1,5.41 / GautSt_5.44: bhojanaṃ tu kṣatriyasyordhvaṃ brāhmanebhyaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:297: GautAA_1,5.42 / GautSt_5.45: anyān bhṛtyaiḥ sahānṛśaṃsyārtham ānṛśaṃsyārtham /
GSD37gautdh_u:303: GautAA_1,6.3 / GautSt_6.3: mātṛpitṛtadbandhūnāṃ pūrvajānāṃ vidyāgurūṇāṃtadgurūṇāṃ ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:305: GautAA_1,6.5 / GautSt_6.5: svanāma procyāhamayam ity abhivādojñasamavāye /
GSD37gautdh_u:311: GautAA_1,6.9 / GautSt_6.9: ṛtvikchvaśurapitṛvyamātulānāṃ tu yavīyasāṃpratyutthānam abhivādyāḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:313: GautAA_1,6.10 / GautSt_6.10: tathānyaḥ pūrvaḥ pauro 'śītikāvaraḥśūdro 'py apatyasamena /
GSD37gautdh_u:318: GautAA_1,6.14 / GautSt_6.14: bho bhavann iti vayasyaḥ samāne 'hani jātaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:323: GautAA_1,6.17 / GautSt_6.19: dīkṣitaś ca prāk krayāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:325: GautAA_1,6.19 / GautSt_6.21: śrutaṃ tu sarvebhyo garīyaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:329: GautAA_1,6.22 / GautSt_6.25: rājñā tu śrotriyāya śrotriyāya /
GSD37gautdh_u:354: GautAA_1,7.21 / GautSt_7.21: samenāmena tu pakvasya saṃpratyarthe /
GSD37gautdh_u:355: GautAA_1,7.22 / GautSt_7.22: sarvathā vṛttir aśaktāv aśaudreṇa /
GSD37gautdh_u:357: GautAA_1,7.23 / GautSt_7.23: tad apy eke prāṇasaṃśaye /
GSD37gautdh_u:359: GautAA_1,7.25 / GautSt_7.25: prāṇasaṃśaye brāhmaṇo 'pi śastram ādadīta /
GSD37gautdh_u:364: GautAA_1,8.1 / GautSt_8.1: dvau loke dhṛtavratau rājā brāhmaṇaś ca bahuśrutaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:365: GautAA_1,8.2 / GautSt_8.2: tayoś caturvidhasya manuṣyajātasyāntaḥsaṃjñānāmcalanapatanasarpaṇānām āyattaṃ jīvanam /
GSD37gautdh_u:368: GautAA_1,8.4 / GautSt_8.4: sa eva bahuśruto bhavati /
GSD37gautdh_u:379: GautAA_1,8.13 / GautSt_8.13: avadhyaś cābandhyaś cādaṇḍyaś cābahiṣkāryaścāparivādyaś cāparihāryaś ceti /
GSD37gautdh_u:385: GautAA_1,8.19 / GautSt_8.18: aṣṭakā pārvaṇaḥ śrāddham śrāvaṇyāgrahāyaṇīcaitryāśvayujīti sapta pākayajñasamsthāḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:386: GautAA_1,8.20 / GautSt_8.19: agnyādheyam agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsāvāgrayaṇaṃ cāturmāsyāni nirūḍhapaśubandhaḥ sautrāmaṇīti saptahaviryajñasamsthāḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:388: GautAA_1,8.21 / GautSt_8.20: agniṣṭomo 'tyagniṣṭoma ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśīvājapeyo 'tirātro 'ptoryāma iti sapta somasaṃsthāḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:391: GautAA_1,8.24 / GautSt_8.23: dayā sarvabhūteṣu kṣāntir anasūyā śaucam anāyāsomaṅgalam akārpaṇyam aspṛheti /
GSD37gautdh_u:392: GautAA_1,8.25 / GautSt_8.24: yasyaite catvāriṃśatsaṃskārā na cāṣṭāv ātmaguṇāna sa brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyaṃ sālokyaṃ gacchati /
GSD37gautdh_u:393: GautAA_1,8.26 / GautSt_8.25: yasya tu khalu saṃskārāṇām ekadeśo 'py aṣṭāv ātmaguṇā atha sa brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyaṃ sālokyaṃ cagacchati /
GSD37gautdh_u:397: GautAA_1,9.1 / GautSt_9.1: sa vidhipūrvakaṃ snātvā bhāryām adhigamyayathoktān gṛhasthadharmān prayuñjāna imāni vratāny anukarṣet /
GSD37gautdh_u:400: GautAA_1,9.3 / GautSt_9.2: nityaṃ śuciḥ sugandhiḥ snānaśīlaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:402: GautAA_1,9.4 / GautSt_9.3: sati vibhave na jīrṇamalavadvāsāḥ syāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:403: GautAA_1,9.5 / GautSt_9.4: na raktam ulbaṇam anyadhṛtaṃ vāso bibhṛyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:407: GautAA_1,9.9 / GautSt_9.8: nāgnim apaś ca yugapad dhārayet /
GSD37gautdh_u:411: GautAA_1,9.13 / GautSt_9.12: na vāyvagniviprādityāpo devatā gāś ca pratipaśyan vā mūtrapurīṣāmedhyān vyudasyet /
GSD37gautdh_u:413: GautAA_1,9.14 / GautSt_9.13: naitā devatāḥ prati pādau prasārayet /
GSD37gautdh_u:414: GautAA_1,9.15 / GautSt_9.14: na parṇaloṣṭāśmabhir mūtrapurīṣāpakarṣaṇaṃ kuryāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:417: GautAA_1,9.17 / GautSt_9.16: na mlecchāśucyadhārmikaiḥ saha saṃbhāṣeta /
GSD37gautdh_u:418: GautAA_1,9.18 / GautSt_9.17: saṃbhāṣya puṇyakṛto manasā dhyāyet /
GSD37gautdh_u:419: GautAA_1,9.19 / GautSt_9.18: brāhmaṇena vā saha saṃbhāṣeta /
GSD37gautdh_u:424: GautAA_1,9.24 / GautSt_9.23: gāṃ dhayantīṃ parasmai nācakṣīta /
GSD37gautdh_u:426: GautAA_1,9.26 / GautSt_9.25: na mithunī bhūtvā śaucaṃ prati vilambeta /
GSD37gautdh_u:427: GautAA_1,9.27 / GautSt_9.26: na ca tasmin śayane svādhyāyam adhīyīta /
GSD37gautdh_u:428: GautAA_1,9.28 / GautSt_9.27: na cāpararātram adhītya punaḥ pratisaṃviśet /
GSD37gautdh_u:436: GautAA_1,9.33 / GautSt_9.33: na sandigdhāṃ nāvam adhirohet /
GSD37gautdh_u:438: GautAA_1,9.35 / GautSt_9.35: na prāvṛtya śiro 'hani paryaṭet /
GSD37gautdh_u:445: GautAA_1,9.41 / GautSt_9.41: ubhe mūtrapurīṣe tu divā kuryād udaṅmukhaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:450: GautAA_1,9.44 / GautSt_9.44: pālāśam āsanaṃ pāduke dantadhāvanam iti ca varjayet /
GSD37gautdh_u:453: GautAA_1,9.46 / GautSt_9.46: na pūrvāhṇamadhyaṃdināparāhṇān aphalān kuryādyathāśakti dharmārthakāmebhyaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:454: GautAA_1,9.47 / GautSt_9.47: teṣu tu dharmottarah syāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:455: GautAA_1,9.48 / GautSt_9.48: na nagnāṃ parayoṣitam īkṣeta /
GSD37gautdh_u:461: GautAA_1,9.54 / GautSt_9.54: na yajñam avṛto gacchet /
GSD37gautdh_u:463: GautAA_1,9.56 / GautSt_9.56: na bhakṣān utsaṅge bhakṣayet /
GSD37gautdh_u:468: GautAA_1,9.59 / GautSt_9.59: sāyaṃprātas tv annam abhipūjitam anindan bhuñjīta /
GSD37gautdh_u:469: GautAA_1,9.60 / GautSt_9.60: na kadācid rātrau nagnaḥ svapet /
GSD37gautdh_u:471: GautAA_1,9.62 / GautSt_9.62: yac cātmavanto vṛddhāḥ samyagvinītādambhalobhamohaviyuktā vedavida ācakṣate tat samācaret /
GSD37gautdh_u:474: GautAA_1,9.65 / GautSt_9.65: prabhūtaidhodakayavasakuśamālyopaniṣkramaṇamāryajana bhūyiṣṭham analasasamṛddhaṃ dhārmikādhiṣṭhitaṃ niketanamāvasituṃ yateta /
GSD37gautdh_u:477: GautAA_1,9.67 / GautSt_9.67: manasā vā tatsamagram ācāram anupālayed āpatkalpaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:484: GautAA_1,9.73 / GautSt_9.73: nityam ahiṃsro mṛdur dṛḍhakārī damadānaśīlaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:485: GautAA_1,9.74 / GautSt_9.74: evam ācāro mātāpitarau pūrvāparāṃś ca sambandhānduritebhyo mokṣayiṣyan snātakaḥ śaśvadbrahmalokān na cyavate na cyavate /
GSD37gautdh_u:489: GautAA_2,1.1 / GautSt_10.1: dvijātīnām adhyayanam ijyā dānam /
GSD37gautdh_u:492: GautAA_2,1.4 / GautSt_10.4: ācāryajñātipriyagurudhanavidyāniyameṣu brahmaṇaḥsaṃpradānam anyatra yathoktāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:506: GautAA_2,1.16 / GautSt_10.16: saṅgrāme saṃsthānam anivṛttiś ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:507: GautAA_2,1.17 / GautSt_10.17: na doṣo hiṃsāyām āhave /
GSD37gautdh_u:510: GautAA_2,1.19 / GautSt_10.19: kṣatriyaś ced anyas tam upajīvet tadvṛttyā /
GSD37gautdh_u:511: GautAA_2,1.20 / GautSt_10.20: jetā labheta sāṃgrāmikaṃ vittam /
GSD37gautdh_u:515: GautAA_2,1.23 / GautSt_10.23: anyat tu yathārhaṃ bhājayed rājā /
GSD37gautdh_u:516: GautAA_2,1.24 / GautSt_10.24: rājño balidānaṃ karṣakairdaśamam aṣṭamaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vā /
GSD37gautdh_u:518: GautAA_2,1.25 / GautSt_10.25: paśuhiraṇyayor apy eke pañcāśadbhāgaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:523: GautAA_2,1.29 / GautSt_10.29: teṣu tu nityayuktaḥ syāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:525: GautAA_2,1.31 / GautSt_10.31: śilpino māsi māsy ekaikaṃ karma kuryuḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:530: GautAA_2,1.35 / GautSt_10.35: paṇyaṃ vaṇigbhir arthāpacayena deyam /
GSD37gautdh_u:532: GautAA_2,1.36 / GautSt_10.36: pranaṣṭam asvāmikam adhigamya rājñe prabrūyuḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:533: GautAA_2,1.37 / GautSt_10.37: vikhyāpya saṃvatsaraṃ rājñā rakṣyam /
GSD37gautdh_u:534: GautAA_2,1.38 / GautSt_10.38: ūrdhvam adhigantuś caturthaṃ rājñaḥ śeṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:542: GautAA_2,1.45 / GautSt_10.45: abrāhmaṇo 'py ākhyātā ṣaṣṭhaṃ labhetety eke /
GSD37gautdh_u:543: GautAA_2,1.46 / GautSt_10.46: caurahṛtam apajitya yathāsthānam gamayet /
GSD37gautdh_u:546: GautAA_2,1.48 / GautSt_10.48a: rakṣyaṃ bāladhanam ā vyavahāraprāpaṇāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:549: GautAA_2,1.51 / GautSt_10.50: śūdraś caturtho varṇa ekajātiḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:550: GautAA_2,1.52 / GautSt_10.51: tasyāpi satyam akrodhaḥ śaucam /
GSD37gautdh_u:564: GautAA_2,1.63 / GautSt_10.61: yaṃ cāryam āśrayed bhartavyas tena kṣīṇo 'pi /
GSD37gautdh_u:569: GautAA_2,1.67 / GautSt_10.65: pākayajñaiḥ svayaṃ yajetety eke /
GSD37gautdh_u:571: GautAA_2,1.69 / GautSt_10.67: āryānāryayor vyatikṣepe karmaṇaḥ sāmyaṃ /
GSD37gautdh_u:584: GautAA_2,2.7 / GautSt_11.7: tam uparyāsīnam adhastād upāsīrann anyebrāhmaṇebhyaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:586: GautAA_2,2.9 / GautSt_11.9: varṇān āśramāṃś ca nyāyato 'bhirakṣet /
GSD37gautdh_u:587: GautAA_2,2.10 / GautSt_11.10: calataś caitān svadharme sthāpayet /
GSD37gautdh_u:589: GautAA_2,2.11 / GautSt_11.11: dharmasya hy aṃśabhāg bhavatīti /
GSD37gautdh_u:591: GautAA_2,2.12 / GautSt_11.12: brāhmanaṃ ca purodadhītavidyābhijanavāgrūpavayaḥśīlasaṃpannaṃ nyāyavṛttaṃ tapasvinam /
GSD37gautdh_u:594: GautAA_2,2.14 / GautSt_11.14: brahmaprasūtaṃ hi kṣattram ṛdhyate na vyathata iti cavijñāyate /
GSD37gautdh_u:596: GautAA_2,2.15 / GautSt_11.15: yāni ca daivotpātacintakāḥ prabrūyus tānyādriyeta /
GSD37gautdh_u:597: GautAA_2,2.16 / GautSt_11.16: tadadhīnam api hy eke yogakṣemaṃ pratijānate /
GSD37gautdh_u:601: GautAA_2,2.19 / GautSt_11.19: tasya ca vyavahāro vedo dharmaśāstrāṇy aṅgānyupavedāḥ purāṇam /
GSD37gautdh_u:603: GautAA_2,2.20 / GautSt_11.20: deśajātikuladharmāś cāmnāyair aviruddhāḥ pramāṇam /
GSD37gautdh_u:604: GautAA_2,2.21 / GautSt_11.21: karṣakavaṇikpaśupālakusīdikāravaḥ sve sve varge /
GSD37gautdh_u:605: GautAA_2,2.22 / GautSt_11.22: tebhyo yathādhikāram arthān pratyavahṛtyadharmavyavasthā /
GSD37gautdh_u:608: GautAA_2,2.25 / GautSt_11.25: vipratipattau traividyavṛddhebhyaḥ pratyavahṛtyaniṣṭhāṃ gamayet /
GSD37gautdh_u:609: GautAA_2,2.26 / GautSt_11.26: tathā hy asya niḥśreyasaṃ bhavati /
GSD37gautdh_u:610: GautAA_2,2.27 / GautSt_11.27: brahma kṣattreṇa saṃpṛktaṃ devapitṛmanuṣyāndhārayatīti vijñāyate /
GSD37gautdh_u:612: GautAA_2,2.28 / GautSt_11.28: daṇḍo damanād ity āhus tenādāntān damayet /
GSD37gautdh_u:613: GautAA_2,2.29a / GautSt_11.29a: varṇāśramāḥ svasvadharmaniṣṭhāḥ pretya karmaphalamanubhūya tataḥ śeṣena viśiṣṭadeśajātikularūpāyuḥśrutacitravittasukhamedhaso /
GSD37gautdh_u:619: GautAA_2,2.31 / GautSt_11.31: tān ācāryopadeśo daṇḍaś ca pālayate /
GSD37gautdh_u:620: GautAA_2,2.32 / GautSt_11.32: tasmād rājācāryāv anindyāv anindyau /
GSD37gautdh_u:623: GautAA_2,3.1 / GautSt_12.1: śūdro dvijātīn abhisaṃdhāyābhihatya cavāgdaṇḍapāruṣyābhyām aṅgamocyo yenopahanyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:626: GautAA_2,3.2 / GautSt_12.2: āryastryabhigamane liṅgoddhāraḥ svaharaṇaṃ ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:629: GautAA_2,3.4a / GautSt_12.4: atha hāsya vedam upaśṛṇvatas trapujatubhyāṃśrotrapratipūraṇam /
GSD37gautdh_u:636: GautAA_2,3.8 / GautSt_12.11: brāhmaṇas tu kṣatriye pañcāśat /
GSD37gautdh_u:654: GautAA_2,3.24 / GautSt_12.27: śiṣṭākaraṇe pratiṣiddhasevāyāṃ ca nityaṃcailapiṇḍād ūrdhvaṃ svaharaṇam /
GSD37gautdh_u:656: GautAA_2,3.25 / GautSt_12.28: go'gnyarthe tṛṇamedhān vīrudvanaspatīnāṃ capuṣpāṇi svavad ādadīta phalāni cāparivṛtānām /
GSD37gautdh_u:657: GautAA_2,3.26 / GautSt_12.29: kusīdavṛddhir dharmyā viṃśatiḥ pañcamāṣikī māsam /
GSD37gautdh_u:665: GautAA_2,3.34 / GautSt_12.37: ajaḍāpaugaṇḍadhanaṃ daśavarṣabhuktaṃ paraiḥ saṃnidhaubhoktuḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:673: GautAA_2,3.39 / GautSt_12.42: nidhyanvādhiyācitāvakrītādhayo naṣṭāh sarvānaninditān puruṣāparādhena /
GSD37gautdh_u:675: GautAA_2,3.40 / GautSt_12.43: stenaḥ prakīrṇakeṣo musalī rājānam iyātkarmācakṣānaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:689: GautAA_2,4.2 / GautSt_13.2: bahavaḥ syur aninditāḥ svakarmasu prātyayikā rājñāṃniṣprītyanabhitāpāś cānyatarasmin /
GSD37gautdh_u:692: GautAA_2,4.4 / GautSt_13.4: brāhmaṇas tv abrāhmaṇavacanād anavarodhyo 'nibaddhaścet /
GSD37gautdh_u:695: GautAA_2,4.6 / GautSt_13.6: avacane 'nyathāvacane ca doṣiṇaḥ(doṣa-) syuḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:697: GautAA_2,4.7 / GautSt_13.7: svargaḥ satyavacane viparyaye narakaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:705: GautAA_2,4.14 / GautSt_13.14: kṣudrapaśvanṛte sākṣī daśa hanti /
GSD37gautdh_u:715: GautAA_2,4.23 / GautSt_13.23: mithyāvacane yāpyo daṇḍyaś ca sākṣī /
GSD37gautdh_u:716: GautAA_2,4.24 / GautSt_13.24: nānṛtavacane doṣo jīvanaṃ cet tadadhīnam /
GSD37gautdh_u:717: GautAA_2,4.25 / GautSt_13.25: na tu pāpīyaso jīvanam /
GSD37gautdh_u:718: GautAA_2,4.26 / GautSt_13.26: rājā prāḍvivāko brāhmaṇo vā śāstravit /
GSD37gautdh_u:723: GautAA_2,4.31 / GautSt_13.31: sarvadharmebhyo garīyaḥ prāḍvivāke satyavacanaṃsatyavacanam /
GSD37gautdh_u:726: GautAA_2,5.1 / GautSt_14.1: śāvam āśaucaṃ daśarātram anṛtvig(ṛtvij)
GSD37gautdh_u:732: GautAA_2,5.5 / GautSt_14.6: tac ced antaḥ punar āpatec cheṣeṇa śudhyeran /
GSD37gautdh_u:739: GautAA_2,5.12 / GautSt_14.13: piṇḍanivṛttiḥ saptame pañcame vā /
GSD37gautdh_u:745: GautAA_2,5.17 / GautSt_14.19: śrutvā cordhvaṃ daśamyāḥ pakṣiṇīm /
GSD37gautdh_u:746: GautAA_2,5.18 / GautSt_14.20: asapiṇḍe yonisaṃbandhe sahādhyāyini ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:749: GautAA_2,5.21 / GautSt_14.23: pretopasparśane daśarātram āśaucam abhisaṃdhāya cet /
GSD37gautdh_u:755: GautAA_2,5.27 / GautSt_14.29: avaraś ced varṇaḥ pūrvavarṇam upaspṛśet pūrvovāvaraṃ tatra śavoktam āśaucam /
GSD37gautdh_u:761: GautAA_2,5.31 / GautSt_14.32: yad upahanyād ity eke /
GSD37gautdh_u:768: GautAA_2,5.37 / GautSt_14.39: na māṃsaṃ bhakṣayeyur ā pradānāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:788: GautAA_2,6.6 / GautSt_15.6: śaktitaḥ prakarṣed guṇasaṃskāravidhir annasya /
GSD37gautdh_u:795: GautAA_2,6.12 / GautSt_15.12: na ca tena mitrakarma kuryāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:796: GautAA_2,6.13 / GautSt_15.13: putrābhāve sapiṇḍā mātṛsapiṇḍāḥ śiṣyāś ca dadyuḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:813: GautAA_2,6.20 / GautSt_15.20: śiṣyāṃś caike sagotrāṃś ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:816: GautAA_2,6.23 / GautSt_15.22: sadyaḥ śrāddhī śūdrātalpagas tatpurīṣe māsaṃnayati pitṛṛn /
GSD37gautdh_u:817: GautAA_2,6.24 / GautSt_15.23: tasmāt tadaham brahmacārī ca syāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:824: GautAA_2,6.29 / GautSt_15.28: paṅktipāvanaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavij jyeṣṭhasāmikas triṇāciketastrimadhus trisuparṇaḥ pañcāgniḥ snātako mantrabrāhmaṇavid dharmajñobrahmadeyānusaṃtāna iti /
GSD37gautdh_u:832: GautAA_2,7.1 / GautSt_16.1: śrāvaṇādi vārṣikaṃ proṣṭhapadīṃvopākṛtyādhīyīta cchandāṃsi /
GSD37gautdh_u:834: GautAA_2,7.2 / GautSt_16.2: ardhapañcamān māsān pañca dakṣiṇāyanaṃ vā /
GSD37gautdh_u:835: GautAA_2,7.3 / GautSt_16.3: brahmacāry utsṛṣṭalomā na māṃsaṃ bhuñjīta /
GSD37gautdh_u:837: GautAA_2,7.5 / GautSt_16.5: nādhīyīta vāyau divā pāṃsuhare /
GSD37gautdh_u:851: GautAA_2,7.17 / GautSt_16.17: bhīto yānasthaḥ śayānaḥ prauḍhapādaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:856: GautAA_2,7.21 / GautSt_16.21: ṛgyajuṣaṃ ca sāmaśabdo yāvat /
GSD37gautdh_u:868: GautAA_2,7.32 / GautSt_16.32: viṣayasthe ca rājñi(rājan) prete /
GSD37gautdh_u:881: GautAA_2,7.44 / GautSt_16.44: prādhītasya ca niśāyāṃ caturmuhūrtam /
GSD37gautdh_u:887: GautAA_2,7.49 / GautSt_16.49: pratividyaṃ ca yān smaranti /
GSD37gautdh_u:891: GautAA_2,8.1 / GautSt_17.1: praśastānāṃ svakarmasu dvijātīnāṃ brāhmaṇo bhuñjīta /
GSD37gautdh_u:896: GautAA_2,8.5 / GautSt_17.5: vṛttiś cen nāntareṇa śūdrāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:917: GautAA_2,8.22 / GautSt_17.22: goś ca kṣīram anirdaśāyāḥ sūtake /
GSD37gautdh_u:919: GautAA_2,8.24 / GautSt_17.24: nityam āvikam apeyam auṣṭram aikaśaphaṃ ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:958: GautAA_2,9.14 / GautSt_18.14: rakṣaṇāt tu bhartur(bhartṛ) eva /
GSD37gautdh_u:961: GautAA_2,9.16 / GautSt_18.16: pravrajite tu nivṛttiḥ prasaṅgāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:962: GautAA_2,9.17 / GautSt_18.17: dvādaśa varṣāṇi brāhmaṇasya vidyāsaṃbandhe /
GSD37gautdh_u:966: GautAA_2,9.20 / GautSt_18.20: trīn kumāry ṛtūn atītya svayaṃyujyetāninditenotsṛjya pitryān alaṃkārān /
GSD37gautdh_u:970: GautAA_2,9.23 / GautSt_18.23: prāg vāsasaḥ pratipatter ity eke /
GSD37gautdh_u:972: GautAA_2,9.24 / GautSt_18.24: dravyādānaṃ vivāhasiddhyarthaṃ dharmatantrasaṃyogeca śūdrāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:973: GautAA_2,9.25 / GautSt_18.25: anyatrāpi śūdrād bahupaśor hīnakarmaṇaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:979: GautAA_2,9.31 / GautSt_18.31: tena hi bhartavyaḥ śrutaśīlasaṃpannaś cet /
GSD37gautdh_u:984: GautAA_3,1.1 / GautSt_19.1: ukto varṇadharmaś cāśramadharmaś ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:986: GautAA_3,1.2 / GautSt_19.2: atha khalv ayaṃ puruṣo yāpyena karmaṇā lipyate yathaitad ayājyayājanam abhakṣyabhakṣaṇam avadyavadanaṃśiṣṭasyākriyā pratiṣiddhasevanam iti /
GSD37gautdh_u:987: GautAA_3,1.3 / GautSt_19.3: tatra prāyaścittaṃ kuryāt na kuryād iti mīmāṃsante /
GSD37gautdh_u:988: GautAA_3,1.4 / GautSt_19.4: na kuryād ity āhuḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:989: GautAA_3,1.5 / GautSt_19.5: na hi karma kṣīyata iti /
GSD37gautdh_u:991: GautAA_3,1.7 / GautSt_19.7: punaḥstomeneṣṭvā punaḥ savanam āyāntīti vijñāyate /
GSD37gautdh_u:993: GautAA_3,1.9 / GautSt_19.9: tarati sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tarati brahmahatyāṃyo,
GSD37gautdh_u:996: GautAA_3,1.10 / GautSt_19.10: agniṣṭutābhiśasyamānaṃ yājayed iti ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:997: GautAA_3,1.11 / GautSt_19.11: tasya niṣkrayaṇāni japas tapo homa upavāso dānam /
GSD37gautdh_u:998_0: GautAA_3,1.12 / GautSt_19.12: upaniṣado vedāntaḥ sarvacchandaḥsu saṃhitā madhūnyaghamarṣaṇam
GSD37gautdh_u:998_1: atharvaśiro rudrāḥ puruṣasūktaṃ rājatarauhine sāmanībṛhadrathantare puruṣagatir mahānāmnyo
GSD37gautdh_u:998_2: mahāvairājaṃ mahādivākīrtyaṃjyeṣṭhasāmnām anyatamad bahiṣpavamānaṃ kūṣmāṇḍāni pāvamānyaḥsāvitrī ceti pāvamānāni /
GSD37gautdh_u:1001: GautAA_3,1.13 / GautSt_19.13: payovratatā śākabhakṣatā phalabhakṣatāprasṛtayāvako hiraṇyaprāśanaṃ ghṛtaprāśanaṃ somapānam itimedhyāni /
GSD37gautdh_u:1003: GautAA_3,1.14 / GautSt_19.14: sarve śiloccayāḥ sarvāḥ sravantyaḥ puṇyā hradāstīrthāny ṛṣinivāsā goṣṭhapariskandhā iti deśāḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1005: GautAA_3,1.15 / GautSt_19.15: brahmacaryaṃ satyavacanaṃ savaneṣūdakopasparśanamārdravastratādhaḥśāyitānāśaka iti tapāṃsi(tapas) /
GSD37gautdh_u:1006: GautAA_3,1.16 / GautSt_19.16: hiraṇyaṃ gaur vāso 'śvo bhūmis tilā ghṛtam annam itideyānīti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1008: GautAA_3,1.17 / GautSt_19.17: saṃvatsaraḥ ṣaṇmāsāś catvāras trayo vā dvauvaikaś caturviṃśatyaho dvādaśāhaḥ ṣaḍahas tryaho 'horātra itikālāḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1010: GautAA_3,1.18 / GautSt_19.18: etāny evānādeśe vikalpena kriyeran /
GSD37gautdh_u:1013: GautAA_3,1.20 / GautSt_19.20: kṛcchrātikṛcchrau cāndrāyaṇam iti sarvaprāyaścittaṃ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1018: rājaghātakaṃ śūdrayājakaṃśūdrārthayājakaṃ vedaviplāvakaṃ bhrūṇahanaṃ yaś cāntyāvasāyibhiḥsaha saṃvased antyāvasāyinyāṃ ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:1021: GautAA_3,2.2 / GautSt_20.2: tasya vidyāgurūn yonisaṃbandhāṃś ca saṃnipātyasarvāṇy udakādīni pretakāryāṇi kuryuḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1024: GautAA_3,2.4 / GautSt_20.4: dāsaḥ karmakaro vāvakarād amedhyapātram ānīyadāsīghaṭāt pūrayitvā dakṣiṇāmukho yadā viparyasyed amukam anudakaṃkaromi iti nāmagrāham /
GSD37gautdh_u:1027: GautAA_3,2.5 / GautSt_20.5: taṃ sarve 'nvālabheran prācīnāvītino muktaśikhāḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1030: GautAA_3,2.7 / GautSt_20.7: apa upaspṛśya grāmaṃ praviśanti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1031: GautAA_3,2.8 / GautSt_20.8: ata uttaraṃ tena saṃbhāṣya tiṣṭhed ekarātraṃ japansāvitrīm ajñānapūrvam /
GSD37gautdh_u:1035: GautAA_3,2.10 / GautSt_20.10: yas tu prāyaścittena śudhyet tasmiñ śuddheśātakumbhamayaṃ pātraṃ puṇyatamād dhradāt pūrayitvā sravantībhyovā tata enam apa upasparśayeyuḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1036: GautAA_3,2.11 / GautSt_20.11: athāsmai tatpātram dadyus tatapratigṛhya japecśāntā dyauḥ śāntā pṛthivī śāntaṃ śivam antarikṣaṃ yo rocanastābhamam gṛhṇāmiiti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1038: GautAA_3,2.12a / GautSt_20.12: etair yajurbhiḥ pāvamānībhis taratsamandībhiḥkūṣmāṇḍaiś cājyaṃ juhuyād /
GSD37gautdh_u:1042: GautAA_3,2.15 / GautSt_20.15: yasya tu prāṇāntikaṃ prāyaścittaṃ sa mṛtaḥśudhyet /
GSD37gautdh_u:1044: GautAA_3,2.16 / GautSt_20.16: sarvāṇy eva tasminn udakādīni pretakarmāṇi kuryuḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1045: GautAA_3,2.17 / GautSt_20.17: etad eva śāntyudakaṃ sarveṣūpapātakeṣusarveṣūpapātakeṣu /
GSD37gautdh_u:1057: GautAA_3,3.7 / GautSt_21.7: trīṇi prathamāny anirdeśyāny anu /
GSD37gautdh_u:1059: GautAA_3,3.8 / GautSt_21.8: na strīṣv agurutalpaṃ patatīty eke /
GSD37gautdh_u:1061: GautAA_3,3.9 / GautSt_21.9: bhrūṇahani hīnavarṇasevāyāṃ ca strīpatati /
GSD37gautdh_u:1063: GautAA_3,3.10 / GautSt_21.10: kauṭasākṣyaṃ rājagāmi paiśunam guroranṛtābhiśaṃsanaṃ mahāpātakasamāni /
GSD37gautdh_u:1067: GautAA_3,3.12 / GautSt_21.12: ajñānād andhyāpanād ṛtvigācāryaupatanīyasevāyāṃ ca heyau /
GSD37gautdh_u:1070: GautAA_3,3.14 / GautSt_21.14: tasya ca pratigrahītety eke /
GSD37gautdh_u:1071: GautAA_3,3.15 / GautSt_21.15: na karhicin mātāpitror(mātṛpitṛ) avṛttiḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1072: GautAA_3,3.16 / GautSt_21.16: dāyaṃ tu na bhajeran /
GSD37gautdh_u:1075: GautAA_3,3.19 / GautSt_21.19: durbalahiṃsāyāṃ ca vimocane śaktaś cet /
GSD37gautdh_u:1080: GautAA_3,3.22 / GautSt_21.22: lohitadarśane yāvatas tatpraskandya pāṃsūnsaṃgṛhṇīyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1085: GautAA_3,4.2 / GautSt_22.2: agnau saktir brahmaghnas trir avacchātasya /
GSD37gautdh_u:1086: GautAA_3,4.3 / GautSt_22.3: lakṣyaṃ vā syāt janye śastrabhṛtām /
GSD37gautdh_u:1087: GautAA_3,4.4 / GautSt_22.4: khaṭvāṅgakapālapāṇir vā dvādaśa saṃvatsarānbrahmacārī bhaikṣāya grāmaṃ praviśet karmācakṣāṇaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1090: GautAA_3,4.7 / GautSt_22.7: prāṇalābhe vā tannimitte brāhmaṇasya /
GSD37gautdh_u:1100: GautAA_3,4.14 / GautSt_22.14: rājanyavadhe ṣaḍvārṣikaṃ prākṛtaṃ brahmacaryamṛṣabhaikasahasrāś ca gā dadyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1101: GautAA_3,4.15 / GautSt_22.15: vaiśye tu traivārṣikam ṛṣabhaikaśatāś ca gādadyād /
GSD37gautdh_u:1103: GautAA_3,4.16 / GautSt_22.16: śūdre saṃvatsaram ṛṣabhaikādaśāś ca gā dadyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1110: GautAA_3,4.22 / GautSt_22.22: api vāsthanvatām ekaikasmin kiṃcid dadyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1111: GautAA_3,4.23 / GautSt_22.23: ṣaṇḍhe palālabhāraḥ sīsamāṣaś ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:1125: GautAA_3,4.35 / GautSt_22.35: strī yāticāriṇī guptā piṇḍaṃ tu labheta /
GSD37gautdh_u:1127: GautAA_3,4.36 / GautSt_22.36: amānuṣīṣu govarjaṃ strīkṛte kūṣmāṇḍair ghṛtahomoghṛtahomaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1130: GautAA_3,5.1 / GautSt_23.1: surāpasya brāhmaṇasyoṣṇām āsiñceyuḥ surām āsyemṛtaḥ śudhyet /
GSD37gautdh_u:1131: GautAA_3,5.2 / GautSt_23.2: amatyā pāne payo ghṛtam udakaṃ vāyuṃ pratitryahaṃtaptāni sa kṛcchras tato 'sya saṃskāraḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1135: GautAA_3,5.6 / GautSt_23.6: gandhāghrāṇe surāpasya prāṇāyāmā ghṛtaprāśanaṃ ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:1137: GautAA_3,5.8 / GautSt_23.8: tapte lohaśayane gurutalpagaḥ śayīta /
GSD37gautdh_u:1140: GautAA_3,5.10 / GautSt_23.10: liṅgaṃ vā savṛṣaṇam utkṛtya añjalāv ādhāyadakṣiṇāpratīcīṃ vrajed ajihmam ā śarīranipātāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1143: GautAA_3,5.12 / GautSt_23.12: sakhīsayonisagotrāśiṣyabhāryāsu sunuṣāyāṃ gavi cagurutalpasamaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1146: GautAA_3,5.14 / GautSt_23.14: śvabhir ādayed rājā nihīnavarṇagamane striyaṃprakāśam /
GSD37gautdh_u:1151: GautAA_3,5.17 / GautSt_23.17: gardabhenāvakīrṇī nirṛtiṃ catuṣpathe yajet /
GSD37gautdh_u:1153: GautAA_3,5.18 / GautSt_23.18: tasyājinam ūrdhvabālaṃ paridhāya lohitapatraḥ saptagṛhān bhakṣaṃ caretkarmācakṣāṇaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1156: GautAA_3,5.20 / GautSt_23.20: retaḥskandane bhaye roge svapne 'gnīndhanabhaikṣacaraṇāni saptarātram akṛtvājyahomaḥ samidho vāretasyābhyām /
GSD37gautdh_u:1160: GautAA_3,5.22 / GautSt_23.22: aśuciṃ dṛṣṭvā ādityam īkṣeta prāṇāyāmaṃ kṛtvā /
GSD37gautdh_u:1163: GautAA_3,5.25 / GautSt_23.25: saptarātraṃ vā svayaṃśīrṇāny upabhuñjānaḥphalāny anatikrāman /
GSD37gautdh_u:1165: GautAA_3,5.26 / GautSt_23.26: prākpañcanakhebhyaś chardanaṃ ghṛtaprāśanaṃ ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:1166: GautAA_3,5.27 / GautSt_23.27: ākrośānṛtahiṃsāsu trirātraṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1170: GautAA_3,5.30 / GautSt_23.30: na tu khalu gurvartheṣu /
GSD37gautdh_u:1171: GautAA_3,5.31 / GautSt_23.31: sapta puruṣānitaś ca parataś ca hanti manasāpiguror(guru)
GSD37gautdh_u:1182: GautAA_3,6.2 / GautSt_24.2: caturṛcaṃ taratsamandīty apsu japed apratigrāhyaṃpratijighṛkṣan pratigṛhya vā /
GSD37gautdh_u:1183: GautAA_3,6.3 / GautSt_24.3: abhojyaṃ bubhukṣamāṇaḥ pṛthivīm āvapet /
GSD37gautdh_u:1184: GautAA_3,6.4 / GautSt_24.4: ṛtvantarāramaṇa udakopasparśanāc chuddhim eke /
GSD37gautdh_u:1187_0: GautAA_3,6.6 / GautSt_24.6: payovrato vā daśarātraṃ ghṛtena dvitīyam adbhistṛtīyaṃ
GSD37gautdh_u:1187_1: divādiṣv ekabhaktiko jalaklinnavāsā lomāni nakhāni tvacammāṃsaṃ śoṇitaṃ snāyvasthi
GSD37gautdh_u:1187_2: majjānam iti homā ātmano mukhe mṛtyor āsyejuhomīty antataḥ sarveṣāṃ prāyaścittaṃ bhrūṇahatyāyāḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1193: GautAA_3,6.9 / GautSt_24.10: tadvrata eva vā brahmahatyāsurāpānasteyagurutalpeṣuprāṇāyāmais tānto 'ghamarṣaṇaṃ japan samam aśvamedhāvabhṛthenedaṃca prāyaścittam /
GSD37gautdh_u:1196: GautAA_3,6.10 / GautSt_24.11: sāvitrīṃ vā sahasrakṛtva āvartayan punītehaivātmānam /
GSD37gautdh_u:1197: GautAA_3,6.11 / GautSt_24.12: antarjale vāghamarṣaṇaṃ trir āvartayansarvapāpebhyo vimucyate /
GSD37gautdh_u:1201: GautAA_3,7.1 / GautSt_25.1: tad āhuḥ katidhāvakīrṇī praviśatīti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1202: GautAA_3,7.2 / GautSt_25.2: marutaḥ prāṇenendre balena bṛhaspatiṃbrahmavarcasenāgnim evetareṇa sarveṇeti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1204: GautAA_3,7.3 / GautSt_25.3: so 'māvāsyāyāṃ niśy agnim upasamādhāyaprāyaścittājyāhutīr juhoti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1207: kāmābhidugdho 'smi abhidugdho 'smi kāmakāmāya svāhetisamidham ādhāya anuparyukṣya yajñavāstu kṛtvopotthāyasamāsiñcatu ity etayā trir upatiṣṭheta /
GSD37gautdh_u:1209: GautAA_3,7.5 / GautSt_25.5: traya ime lokā eṣāṃ lokānām abhijityā abhikrāntyāiti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1211: GautAA_3,7.6 / GautSt_25.6: etad evaikeṣām karmādhikṛtya yo 'prayata iva syāt saitthaṃ juhuyād ittham anumantrayeta varo dakṣiṇeti prāyaścittamaviśeṣāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1213: GautAA_3,7.7 / GautSt_25.7: anārjavapaiśunapratiṣiddhācārānādyaprāśaneṣu śūdrāyāṃ ca retaḥ siktvā(sic)
GSD37gautdh_u:1215: ca doṣavati ca karmaṇy apisaṃdhipūrve 'bliṅgābhir apa upaspṛśed vāruṇībhir anyair vāpavitraiḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1219: GautAA_3,7.9 / GautSt_25.9: sarvāsv apo vācāmed ahaś ca mādityāś ca punātuiti prātā rātriś ca mā varuṇaś ca punātv iti sāyam /
GSD37gautdh_u:1220: GautAA_3,7.10 / GautSt_25.10: aṣṭo vā samidha ādadhyād devakṛtasyeti hutvāeva sarvasmād enaso mucyate /
GSD37gautdh_u:1227: GautAA_3,8.2 / GautSt_26.2: haviṣyān prātar āśān bhuktvā tisro rātrīrnāśnīyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1228: GautAA_3,8.3 / GautSt_26.3: athāparaṃ try ahaṃ naktaṃ bhuñjīta /
GSD37gautdh_u:1229: GautAA_3,8.4 / GautSt_26.4: athāparaṃ try ahaṃ na kaṃcana yāceta /
GSD37gautdh_u:1230: GautAA_3,8.5 / GautSt_26.5: athāparaṃ try aham upavaset /
GSD37gautdh_u:1237: GautAA_3,8.10 / GautSt_26.10: anusavanam udakopasparśanam āpo hi ṣṭhetitisṛbhiḥ pavitravatībhir mārjayīta(mṛj)
GSD37gautdh_u:1242: GautAA_3,8.12 / GautSt_26.12: namo 'hamāya mohamāya maṃhamāya dhanvate tāpasāyapunarvasave namaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1244: namaḥ pārāya supārāya mahāpārāya vārayiṣṇave namaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1251: namaḥ satyāya pāvakāya pāvakavarṇāyakāmāya kāmarūpiṇe namaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1254: namaḥ sobhyāya supuruṣāyamahāpuruṣāya madhyamapuruṣāyottamapuruṣāya brahmacāriṇe namaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1269: svāhā somāya svāhāgniṣomābhyāmindrāgnibhyām indrāya viśvebhyo devebhyo brahmaṇe prajāpataye 'gnayesviṣṭakṛta iti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1274: GautAA_3,8.20 / GautSt_26.20: abbhakṣas tṛtīyaḥ sa kṛcchrātikṛcchraḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1275: GautAA_3,8.21 / GautSt_26.21: prathamaṃ caritvā śuciḥ pūtaḥ karmaṇyo bhavati /
GSD37gautdh_u:1276: GautAA_3,8.22 / GautSt_26.22: dvitīyaṃ caritvā yatkiṃcid anyan mahāpātakebhyaḥpāpaṃ kurute tasmāt pramucyate /
GSD37gautdh_u:1277: GautAA_3,8.23 / GautSt_26.23: tṛtīyaṃ caritvā sarvasmād enaso mucyate /
GSD37gautdh_u:1279: GautAA_3,8.24 / GautSt_26.24: athaitāṃs trīn kṛcchrāṃś caritvā sarveṣu vedeṣusnāto bhavati sarvair devair jñāto bhavati /
GSD37gautdh_u:1292: iti caitābhis tarpaṇam ājyahomo haviṣaś cānumantraṇamupasthānaṃ candramasaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1293: GautAA_3,9.6 / GautSt_27.6: yad devā devaheḍanam iti catasṛbhirjuhuyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1296: GautAA_3,9.8 / GautSt_27.8: oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svas tapaḥ satyaṃ yaśaḥ śrīr ūrgiḍaujas tejo varcaḥ puruṣo dharmaḥ śiva ity etair grāsānumantraṇaṃpratimantraṃ manasā /
GSD37gautdh_u:1298: GautAA_3,9.9 / GautSt_27.9: namaḥ svāheti vā sarvān /
GSD37gautdh_u:1301: GautAA_3,9.12 / GautSt_27.12: paurṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśa grāsān bhuktvāekāpacayenāparapakṣam aśnīyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1307: GautAA_3,9.16 / GautSt_27.16: evam āptvā vipāpo vipāpmā sarvam eno(enas)hanti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1309: GautAA_3,9.17 / GautSt_27.17: dvitīyam āptvā daśa pūrvān daśa parān ātmānaṃcaikaviṃśaṃ paṅktiṃ ca punāti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1311: GautAA_3,9.18 / GautSt_27.18: saṃvatsaraṃ cāptvā candramasaḥ salokatām āpnotisalokatām āpnoti /
GSD37gautdh_u:1320: GautAA_3,10.3 / GautSt_28.3: sarvaṃ vā pūrvajasyetarān bibhṛyāt pitṛvat /
GSD37gautdh_u:1322: GautAA_3,10.5 / GautSt_28.5: viṃśatibhāgo jyeṣṭhasya mithunam ubhayatodadyukto rathogovṛṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1325: GautAA_3,10.7 / GautSt_28.7: avir dhānyāyasī gṛhamano yuktaṃ catuṣpādaṃcaikaikaṃ yavīyasaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1331: GautAA_3,10.9 / GautSt_28.11: ekaikaṃ vā dhanarūpaṃ kāmyaṃ pūrvaḥ pūrvolabhate /
GSD37gautdh_u:1339: GautAA_3,10.15 / GautSt_28.17: pratimātṛ vā svasvavarge bhāgaviśeṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdh_u:1341: GautAA_3,10.16 / GautSt_28.18: pitotsṛjet putrikāṃ anapatyo 'gniṃprajāpatiṃ ceṣṭvāsmadartham apatyam iti saṃvādya /
GSD37gautdh_u:1345: GautAA_3,10.19 / GautSt_28.21: piṇḍagotrarṣisaṃbandhā rikthaṃ bhajeran strīvānapatyasya /
GSD37gautdh_u:1349: GautAA_3,10.22 / GautSt_28.24: strīdhanaṃ duhitṛṛṇām aprattānām apratiṣṭhitāṇāṃ ca /
GSD37gautdh_u:1350: GautAA_3,10.23 / GautSt_28.25: bhaginīśulkaḥ sodaryāṇām ūrdhvaṃ mātuḥ(mātṛ) /
GSD37gautdh_u:1353: GautAA_3,10.26 / GautSt_28.28: saṃsṛṣṭini prete saṃsṛṣṭī rikthabhāk /
GSD37gautdh_u:1355: GautAA_3,10.28 / GautSt_28.30: svayam arjitam avaidyebhyo vaidyaḥ kāmaṃ na dadyāt /
GSD37gautdh_u:1360: GautAA_3,10.33 / GautSt_28.35: brāhmaṇasya rājanyāputro jyeṣṭho guṇasaṃpannastulyabhāk /
GSD37gautdh_u:1364: GautAA_3,10.37 / GautSt_28.39: śūdrāputro 'py anapatyasya śuśrūṣuś cel labhatevṛttimūlam antevāsividhinā /
GSD37gautdh_u:1366: GautAA_3,10.38 / GautSt_28.40: savarṇāputro 'py anyāyyavṛtto na labhetaikeṣām /
GSD37gautdh_u:1367: GautAA_3,10.39 / GautSt_28.41: śrotriyā brāhmaṇasyānapatyasya rikthaṃ bhajeran /
GSD37gautdh_u:1374: GautAA_3,10.46 / GautSt_28.48: anājñāte daśāvaraiḥ śiṣṭair ūhavidbhir alubdhaiḥ praśastaṃ kāryam /
GSD37gautdh_u:1376: GautAA_3,10.47 / GautSt_28.49: catvāraś caturṇāṃ pāragā vedānāṃ prāg uttamāttraya āśramiṇaḥ pṛthag dharmavidas traya etān daśāvarān pariṣad ity ācakṣate /
GSD37gautdh_u:1378: GautAA_3,10.48 / GautSt_28.50: asambhave tv eteṣāṃ śrotriyo vedavicchiṣṭovipratipattau yad āha /
GSD37gautdh_u:1379: GautAA_3,10.49 / GautSt_28.51: yato 'yam aprabhavo bhūtānāṃ hiṃsānugrahayogeṣu /
GSD37gautdh_u:1380: GautAA_3,10.50 / GautSt_28.52: dharmiṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa svargaṃ lokaṃ dharmavid āpnotijñānābhiniveśābhyām /
